body.name: Ingcebo 3Pcs Stove Protector for Gas Range, Washable Reusable Stove Top Covers, Heat Resistant Gas Stove liners, Stove Burner Covers for Gas Stove Top
features: Ingcebo 3 pcs stove burner covers for gas stove top made of 0.01in thick Teflon and can withstand heat over 1050 F° and don’t melt, burn or deform easily. This stove liner is a perfect backup for your daily cooking.
The surface of the stove guard stove top protector is made to keep your stove looking like new, the stovetop cover on your stovetop while keeping the stove tidy-Ingcebo
Our stove liners for gas burners is easy to clean. Simply wipe it down using a damp cloth or place it on the top shelf of your dishwasher, then reuse it as normal. Save more time and energy-Ingcebo
Our gas burner liners is designed with a pre-cut inner ring, so it is easy to fit all stove types in any kitchen-Ingcebo

Gas range protectors covers comes with 3 liners measuring 10.6” by 21.3”, with a thickness of 0.3mm, providing you with extra-thick gas stove liners that are durable with superior heat resistance-Ingcebo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Ngcebo 3Pcs Stove Protector for Gas Range, and I'm thrilled with the results! These stove top covers were a perfect replacement for my old ones. They fit seamlessly onto our Samsung gas range, making installation a breeze. What I love most is how easy they are to put on and clean. Not only do they offer a snug fit, but their washable and reusable features make maintenance a simple task. The heat-resistant qualities of these stove burner covers provide an added layer of protection. Overall, a fantastic investment for anyone looking to enhance their gas stove top experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars They don’t fit.
reviews.reviewText: The precut holes do not match my standard stove. I will have to cut them in half and figure out how to connect the center to make them fit. The original description gave the impression that it would fit. I have never seen a stove with the depth needed to fit these stove protectors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t fit stove
reviews.reviewText: The liners are very easy to clean and work great however they are not a good fit for my stove and were difficult to try and cut/size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected.
reviews.reviewText: Maybe I wasn't paying close enough attention. These did not fit my standard gas stove at all, but that's my fault for not measuring before ordering. The holes didn't fit the gas flame holes either, which I feel are standard for every residential stove.The material was stiff plastic/vinyl is material. I thought it would be a more pliable material.Didn't use them so don't know if they are good heat resistance or easy cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the money
reviews.reviewText: These did not fit as described. They are not heat resistant and do not work with the stovetops listed. They cannot really be cut to fit as the areas that are precut are way too small and close to the edges. The concept would be great for older stoves that no longer come as clean as they once were. if they matched what was in the description.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wife loves them. They work well.
reviews.reviewText: Wife loves them. They work well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A bit hard to cut and adjust otherwise great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was a laughable attempt at a quality product
